title: Watch Face Gear - Christmas
summary: The application is watch face for the Galaxy Gear.Galaxy Gear1/ Gear2/ Gear2 Neo
description: The application is watch face for the Galaxy Gear.Galaxy Gear1/ Gear2/ Gear2 NeoWhat's New Gear Faces!Enjoy a variety of watch faces for Galaxy Gear!You can create various watches using the Watch Styler.(Only Galaxy Gear1(Tizen OS)/ Galaxy Gear2/ Galaxy Gear2 Neo support.)Application includes 3 pieces of Watch faces.If you download and install the theme application, You can find the theme from Watch Styler.You can create various watches using the Watch Styler.Watch Style Download Guide- Please download Watch Styler through Gear Manager > Samsung Gear Apps.
descriptionHTML:
The application is watch face for the Galaxy Gear.Galaxy Gear1/ Gear2/ Gear2 Neo

What's New Gear Faces!
Enjoy a variety of watch faces for Galaxy Gear!
You can create various watches using the Watch Styler.
(Only Galaxy Gear1(Tizen OS)/ Galaxy Gear2/ Galaxy Gear2 Neo support.)


Application includes 3 pieces of Watch faces.
If you download and install the theme application, You can find the theme from Watch Styler.
You can create various watches using the Watch Styler.


Watch Style Download Guide
- Please download Watch Styler through Gear Manager > Samsung Gear Apps.
comments: Wow! Found out about these online apps accidentally! Downloaded right in watchstyler. Love designing my own but really like this one for Christmas on my original Gear. Looking forward to more! Thanks for your creativity!
Not good Would not let me refund...
